root: ^Have you really never heard of the [Crown Name]? Education at SPI must be lacking.
^It’s a relic of power. Ghosts who are able to wear it can control those that are weaker than it.
^Are we going to have to steal it off someone’s head?
^No, if a ghost was using it, I would probably be under its control with how weak I am now.
^Ok… And why are we just trusting that random ghost on the street?
^Hmmhm? Blonde one… look rich. Other one… look broke.
^My fellow ghosts, please excuse my unannounced visit. I have a very important meeting with your boss.
